ch.epfl.alpano.dem

Class ElevationProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.alpano.dem.ElevationProfile

  • public final class ElevationProfile
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ElevationProfile(ContinuousElevationModel elevationModel, GeoPoint origin, double azimuth, double length)
      Constructs an ElevationProfile, constructs and stores in an array the latitude and the longitude of a point every 4096 meters until the length of the profile is reached

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double elevationAt(double x)
      Calculates the elevation of the profile at a given point
      GeoPoint positionAt(double x)
      Calculates the coordinates (latitude and longitude) of the given point in the profile
      double slopeAt(double x)
      Calculate the slope at a given point of the profile

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ElevationProfile

        public ElevationProfile(ContinuousElevationModel elevationModel,
                        GeoPoint origin,
                        double azimuth,
                        double length)
        Constructs an ElevationProfile, constructs and stores in an array the latitude and the longitude of a point every 4096 meters until the length of the profile is reached
        Parameters:
        elevationModel, - a ContinousElevationModel given
        origin, - a GeoPoint that indicates the beginning of the profile
        azimuth, - a double that give the direction
        length, - a double that represents the length of the profile
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if azimuth is non canonical,or length is smaller or equal than 0
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if elevationModel or origin are null

    • Method Detail

      • elevationAt

        public double elevationAt(double x)
        Calculates the elevation of the profile at a given point
        Parameters:
        x, - a double that indicate the position where we want to know the elevation
        Returns:
        a double that corresponds to the elevation of the profile at the position x

      • positionAt

        public GeoPoint positionAt(double x)
        Calculates the coordinates (latitude and longitude) of the given point in the profile
        Parameters:
        x, - a double where we want to know the coordinates
        Returns:
        a GeopPoint that indicates the coordinates of the point x in the profile
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter x is not between 0 and the length of the profile

      • slopeAt

        public double slopeAt(double x)
        Calculate the slope at a given point of the profile
        Parameters:
        x, - the point where we want to know the slope
        Returns:
        a double that corresponds to the slope at the position x of the profile
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter x is not between 0 and the length of the profile
